content:
Hi, I am working on displaying the number of messages sent to each stream in the subscriptions page along with the 'subscribers-count'. This is what I have now. It would be great to have your suggestions/feedback on this.
Thanks! :)
stream-message-count.png
I like it, it looks consistent with the subscribers-count info. Have you considered other icons than the mail icon, e.g. a speech bubble as used in messaging?
In the 'test' stream, the "New" means that there have been no sent messages, or that you just subscribed to this stream?
If the stream is less than 1 week old, it would show New.
Sounds fair. Regarding streams where new members cannot see messages sent before they joined, would they see the absolute number of messages or the number of the ones they can see?

I like it, it looks consistent with the subscribers-count info. Have you considered other icons than the mail icon, e.g. a speech bubble as used in messaging?

I also considered the 'comment icon'. stream-message-count1.png
Hmm, I prefer the latter one, it looks more appropriate to me, it is more "message-like".
The number displayed is the number of messages sent in a stream the last week -- to help a new user to understand the activity of a stream.

Oh, I see. Yeah, that purpose definitely makes more sense than just the raw number of messages. It might not be obvious though that this is the count per week - I'd have guessed it to be since its creation.
It might be a little over the top for this, but what do you think of displaying activity as a little green bar - the longer and greener, the more active; similar to githubs project activity diagrams

Some suggestions for the 'message count' icon:

1. stream-message-count.png
2. stream-message-count1.png
3. stream-message-count2.png

@Rishi Gupta
I like the third one. Would it be possible to reduce the spacing between both bubbles? So it looks like the one in the head/body of the person icon.
I think we probably don't want the grand total, but instead something more like "per week, on average over the last 4 weeks" or something
Given that concept of what we might be displaying, it's possible that influences what icons to use
Whether it be something simple like just the text "10384/week" or something else
Here it is displaying the count of messages sent in stream in last 7 days.
Cool, but it'd be awesome if we could make that clear visually
Sure. I would add a '/week' to the count. But then should there be an icon after that?

cool!
One thing to note is that this number will typically be in the 5-500 range, I think (i.e. only 1-3 digits).
I like 123/wk [icon]
with maybe an on-hover that explains "average of weekly traffic in last 4 weeks"
I am using last 7 days data and not one calendar week.
Sure. Sounds good :) Thanks!
yeah, by "average weekly traffic" I think we just mean last 28 days data divided by 4 (with appropriate adjustments if stream is between 7 and 28 days old). No need to mess with calendar weeks :).
